welcome.intro: I have experience in developing robust and scalable applications.

about_me_text1: As a Full-Stack Developer, I have a strong academic background supported by Academlo in Mexico and a certification as a Technologist in Software Analysis and Development awarded by SENA in Colombia. My focus is on creating technological solutions that drive your company's efficiency and growth. With a strong desire to learn and improve my coding skills, I am ready to contribute innovation, commitment, and dedication to your team.
about_me_text2: As a Full-Stack Developer trained at Academlo (Mexico) and certified as a Technologist in Software Analysis and Development by SENA (Colombia).
about_me_text2.1: I focus on creating solutions that enhance business efficiency, with a constant commitment to improvement. I bring innovation and dedication to your team.
